label:
This is a monthly email notification that is sent to users who is subscribed to the user tags with the list of the new posts, tagged by these tags.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##FullName## - Name of the user (receiver)
##ActivityList## - List of tagged activities

template.subject: Мonthly email notification
template.body:
Dear ##FullName##,

See below list of activities tagged by tags you are interested in:

##ActivityList##
